description: Example conversation demonstrating a prompt injection attack on the NameForge assistant to exfiltrate its internal system prompt. The attacker first interacts normally, then uses role‑playing and a fabricated system message to trick the assistant into revealing the hidden system prompt that governs tone and safety.
